name: doormat
description: an alternative way to navigate through your site content

scripts.publish:scripts: coffee -p src/coffee > dist/doormat.js && uglifyjs --compress --comments --mangle -o dist/doormat.min.js dist/doormat.js
scripts.publish:styles: stylus src/stylus/doormat.styl -o dist/ && cleancss --s1 -o dist/doormat.min.css dist/doormat.css
scripts.watch:dev: npm run watch:markup & npm run watch:scripts & npm run watch:styles
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:scripts && npm run build:styles && npm run build:markup
scripts.develop: npm run serve & npm run watch:dev
scripts.publish: npm run publish:scripts && npm run publish:styles
scripts.predeploy: rm -rf public && mkdir public && mkdir public/css && npm run build:scripts && npm run build:styles && npm run publish:markup
